title: Design
text: Web design is the process of creating websites. It encompasses several different aspects, including webpage layout.

title: Development
text: Web development refers to building, creating, and an maintaining websites. It includes aspects such as web design.

title: Testing
text: Test design is a process that describes “how” testing should be done. It includes processes for the identifying test cases.

title: Live
text: Web testing is a software testing practice to test websites or web applications for potential bugs. It's a complete testing.
